Timeline
TimeAxis = orientation:horizontal
ScaleMajor = unit:year increment:5 start:1948
Colors =
id:DC    value:rgb(0.529,0.808,0.980)
id:PATT  value:rgb(0,0,0)
id:UPT   value:rgb(0.678,0.847,0.902)
id:LSP   value:rgb(0,0.651,0.317)
BarData =
barset:PM
PlotData=
width:5 align:left fontsize:S shift:(5,-4) anchor:till
barset:PM
from: 20/12/1948 till: 19/12/1952 color:DC text:"Balista" fontsize:10
from: 19/12/1952 till: 14/12/1956 color:DC text:"Albertini" fontsize:10
from: 14/12/1956 till: 30/12/1960 color:DC text:"Rosa" fontsize:10
from: 30/12/1960 till: 13/03/1974 color:DC text:"Kessler" fontsize:10
from: 13/03/1974 till: 15/03/1979 color:DC text:"Grigolli" fontsize:10
from: 15/03/1979 till: 30/10/1985 color:DC text:"Mengoni" fontsize:10
from: 30/10/1985 till: 16/02/1989 color:DC text:"Angeli" fontsize:10
from: 16/02/1989 till: 04/06/1992 color:DC text:"Malossini" fontsize:10
from: 04/06/1992 till: 04/03/1994 color:DC text:"Bazzanella" fontsize:10
from: 04/03/1994 till: 24/02/1999 color:PATT text:"Andreotti" fontsize:10
from: 24/02/1999 till: 29/12/2012 color:UPT text:"Dellai" fontsize:10
from: 09/11/2013 till: 02/11/2018 color:PATT text:"Rossi" fontsize:10
from: 02/11/2018 till: end color:LSP text:"Fugatti" fontsize:10}}
